preAdmissionIdentifier.description: The identifier of the encounter that this episode of care is intended to be replacing

origin.description: The ReferralRequest that initiated this episode of care

admitSource.description: From where patient was admitted (physician referral, transfer)

reAdmission.description: Indicates that the patient is being re-admitted

destination.description: The location to which the patient is discharged

dischargeDisposition.description: Category or kind of location after discharge
